text: Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
author: Ferris Bueller

text: Meaning is about making a difference, not having an audience.
author: Adam Grant

text: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
author: Jimi Hendrix

text: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.
author: Mary Lou Retton

text: Roll with the punches and enjoy every minute of it.
author: Megan Markle

text: You can't always get what you want, but if you try sometimes, you might find, you get what you need.
author: Rolling Stones
